extendedInfo.description: Clash of Monsters is an addictive blend of bring-up and multi-player on line fighting . Summon, raise and evolve your quirky monster troops and battle with thousands of other players online to win their stakes in the ARENA. Driving back the wilding attack is just the first stepââyour quest isnât over until your monster troops supreme over all others!â¥Featuresâ¥:â Summon, raise dozen of quirky and lovable monsters from mythic world.â Evolve your monsters to get arcane battle magic and unleash dozens of screen-shattering powers upon your enemies! Each monster has unique gorgeous attack animation.â Breed your monsters to get exotic, hybrid eggs!â Plant magic food to feed your monsters in the Farm.â Challenge the other players online to win their stakes, and battle for Monster Supremacy in the worldwide Arena.â Set Bet to wait for the the challenge of rivals online in the Arena. Who will supreme over all others?â Enhance your monstersâs battle magic prowess by looking for cryptic shards of Lost Artifacts and recollecting the legendary GODS CARDS which help smite even the deadliest foes!â Lead your monster team to defeat the monster invasion and complete challenging QUESTS.If you have any problem or suggestion, please contact us Atommobilegame@gmail.comPLEASE NOTE:An internet connection is required to play this game, and it is more fun when you play with your friends.PAYMENT ISSUES:CLASH OF MONSTERS is completely free to play, however some game items can also be purchased for real money.KEY WORDS:Monster, dino war, breed, evolve, challenge, Cards, pk, arena, fight, plant.

reviews.title: Fun and Easy
reviews.comment: Fun and easy game. It is, however, a bit slow. It takes a while to build up currency and stuff takes quite a bit of it.
reviews.author: Miranda Nickel

reviews.title: Costs for normal feature
reviews.comment: Costs crystals for breeding monsters would give negetive stars if I could D:
reviews.author: Kainen Starlite

reviews.title: Why pay diamonds for breeding?
reviews.comment: You have to pay diamonds for breeding, I play games like this and think there much better because you don\'t have to pay diamonds for breeding. I uninstalled it and I only played for thirty minutes. Would give negative stars.
reviews.author: liam keaney

reviews.title: Awesome game!but...
reviews.comment: I love this game and im a daily player (ranked 1st in event) and noticed some people have their own name in-game. Ive changed the name and picture at papaya home but it does not show in game and i have not found any in-game options to change it myself. So now im stuck with a name that has a bunch of numbers and a woman with a daisy her in her hair(im a guy), is there any way to change name and picture? If not, can someone please let me know if its bein looked at to be fixed?
reviews.author: Jerry C

reviews.title: Nice game
reviews.comment: Very nice game! I wish there are free gems..
reviews.author: alma purificacion

reviews.title: Stuck on game
reviews.comment: So now when i play the game i go to do battle and everytime i let it go manual or automatic after the battle the monster goes back to the same health it started with even after i killed it! If there were such things as negative stars this game would totally get one! Wasted my time for nothing! >:(
reviews.author: Cameron Mays

reviews.title: Crystals.
reviews.comment: Costs crystals to breed, ridiculous.  Now I am stuck because I do not want to spend money?  Uninstalling.
reviews.author: Tiffani Driver

reviews.title: very friendly game
reviews.comment: very nice but use gem to breed,if no use gem sure i give 10 star rate
reviews.author: Muhd Rimi

reviews.title: Cant start game
reviews.comment: I downloaded the game, but the only thing that comes up is the papaya social junk. There is no way for me to get into the actual game.
reviews.author: George Wingfield

reviews.title: Wtf
reviews.comment: What did I walk in to.. Oh god it left a bad after taste
reviews.author: Miguel Perez

reviews.title: So far enjoying game
reviews.comment: Only down side is it takes a long time to get gems monies n food unless you pay with real money
reviews.author: Karl Mahne

reviews.title: Fun
reviews.comment: Its fun.
reviews.author: Elena Garc\303\255a

reviews.title: Expensive upgrades
reviews.comment: Way too many things cost gems. Upgrading your monsters should be based on the battles they take part in. When they get so much experience then they level up. Do that and I\'ll rate 5 stars
reviews.author: John Hertel

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: It\'s a nice game but gameplay goes very slow, take\'s a lot of time to complete something, and you have to pay for breeding? Seriously? O.o Bummer.....
reviews.author: R. Hardy

reviews.comment: awesome and fun for everyone
reviews.author: Sammie Twoo

reviews.title: Fun
reviews.comment: It a fun game
reviews.author: Sarah Evans

reviews.title: Good game
reviews.comment: Great for killing a little time. It does take a while to do much of anything though.
reviews.author: Ed Busick

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: Takes a little time getting things but yea enjoyable

reviews.title: The best
reviews.comment: Great game!!!

reviews.title: Stop force close
reviews.comment: Seems awesome but force closes on me for 3rd time without letting me do anything.
